channel.title: Carlos Angulo Posts
channel.description: Here you can the general publications I do regarding different subjects as devops or programming ðŸ™‚

item.title: Interactive bookmarks menu v2
item.description: In this post, I am going to improve the interactive bookmark I created in a previous post.

item.title: How to use a repository for importing your bash scripts and shortcuts
item.description: In this post, I will explain how to load custom variables by reading a JSON file, this will be done every time we open a Terminal. I will also improve the shortcuts we create in the previous posts.

item.title: Load custom variables at Terminal startup
item.description: In this post, I will explain how to import custom environment variables from a JSON file.

item.title: Add shortcuts to your bash terminal
item.description: In this post, I will define shortcuts in my bash terminal. The implementation is based on using aliases and functions. Super simple!

item.title: Create an interactive bookmarks menu in your terminal
item.description: In this post, I am going to implement an interactive bookmarks menu using fzf in bash Terminal.

item.title: How to use the PowerShell Profile to be more productive
item.description: In this post, I will explain how to set up shortcuts in the PowerShell Profile. Everything in this article works for PowerShell 5.1 and later.
